Power Analysis for Search Strategy Evaluation

Source: R/benchmark-testing.R
calc_sample_size.Rd

Power Analysis for Search Strategy Evaluation

Usage

calc_sample_size(
  effect_size = 0.1,
  alpha = 0.05,
  power = 0.8,
  baseline_f1 = 0.7
)

Arguments

effect_size

Expected effect size (difference in F1 scores)

alpha

Significance level

power

Desired statistical power

baseline_f1

Baseline F1 score

Value

Required sample size
